item.title: OSINT : 3 methods to find GitHub user email address
item.author: Author
item.description: A bit of context I’m going to list three methods, from the most stealthy and less effective to the less stealthy and most effective to gather an email address using GitHub. There is no particular attack conducted against GitHub users. It is only a matter of iteratively browsing all the information that is publicly available. First method : Profile README ! Since 2016, GitHub allows users to use a Markdown file named “README.
